A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Things that make me love Star Wars\,

- The sense of meaningful adventure
- The excellent pacing
- The large scale of conflicting battle between good and evil 
- The believable and likable characters\, as well as the journey the protagonist and antagonist go through
- The amazing places and environments\, the lore
- The right amount of wit and humor 
- Epic lightsaber duels

The Last Jedi has none of this or fails at executing it.
